Posts.Content: hi everyone on this site.  I've had my second dose of FEC on Thursday. They have now changed my treatment to Texi... Something. Not sure what it is.. What are the none side effects of this drug as FEC I can stand. No nausia, temp, most of the time i feel normal. Slightly worried about FEC-T as I've heard it is A nasty one. Help needed please
Posts.Title: * * * OCTOBER breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Hi.. This is my first time on this forum...ive had one cycle of fec -t and my  2ndcycle is on thursday...i have a blood test tomorrow to check if im  well  enough to have it. How are you feeling after your 2nd fec cycle? I hooe you are feeling well and positive... Regards Bexx
Posts.Title: * * * OCTOBER breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: hi thanks for your reply. I'm new to this. It'd taxotire... It whatever it's spelt...i just don't knw what to expect as a friend has told me it took her into a dark places!!ahh  my hair has started to come out a lot. I've had it shaved so it's just spikes that are coming out.x  sleep well everyone tomorrow is A new day.xx
Posts.Title: * * * OCTOBER breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Hi lovely I was diagnosed in september and am well underway with chemo. My cancer is triple negative.i too had a brca test as my mum had breast cancer (she too was triple negative) she hadit 15 years ago and is fine and ALIVE..dont google anymore. My lummp is over 10cm sovery big.  I had a second MRI scan that shows its shrinking and lymph nods clear when it was showing 3 affected... Im on weekly chemo andhad 3 FEC and 5 carboplatyn and taxil.... My hair has gone and eyebrows and lashes. Im 43 and my daughter is 11 so no age.. Keep your chin up and get the support from friends and family. You can beat this. Love bex xxx
Posts.Title: Newbie *triple neg*
